summary: The implementation appears to be largely complete and aligns well with the BuildRequest. All 10 core requirements have been implemented with backend data models, CRUD operations, filtering, pagination, share functionality, frontend UI components, category filtering, and an admin interface. The visual theme uses energetic colors (orange, red, yellow, green) avoiding blue and purple as specified. However, some acceptance criteria may need verification regarding edge cases like exact character limits and pagination behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Summary text is limited to 280 characters maximum
missing_requirements.reason: The backend model stores summary as Text without visible validation in the actor code. The frontend enforces this in CreateArticleForm, but backend validation is not evident in the truncated code.

missing_requirements.requirement: CRUD operations - Update and Delete methods
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows createNewsArticle and getNewsArticle methods, but update and delete article methods are not visible in the truncated backend code.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with name field
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or personalized news feeds' as a non-goal, but the implementation includes UserProfile type, getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile methods, and a ProfileSetup component that collects user names.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media sharing buttons for X, Facebook, and Instagram
hallucinated_features.reason: The footer in Layout.tsx includes social media icons and links (SiX, SiFacebook, SiInstagram) which were not requested and go beyond the simple clipboard copy functionality specified in REQ-8.
The application includes ThemeProvider with dark mode support in App.tsx and index.css defines both light and dark color schemes. This feature was not requested in the BuildRequest.
